title: Melon cocktail

default: ½ cantalope melon, small rounds cut out with a melon baller, the skin left as a complete 'bowl'
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Place the lime juice, honey and mint into a small food processor and blend until smooth.
Pour the mixture into a bowl, add the melon balls and walnuts and mix well to coat.
To serve, pour the mixture into the empty melon shell 'bowl'.
